param.name: support_id
param.doc: ID of the relevant support file. This is an SHA-256 hash of the support file's filename.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: To edit a support file's comment with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the relevant support file's id.

request.doc: PUT https://{appliance_hostname}/support/950e094e8ac2ab548fe77e87eecacd46 PUT_DATA: { "comment":"this is a new comment for the support file", "filename":"iswga_8.0.0.0_20130513-032905.707994_iswga.support", "id":"950e094e8ac2ab548fe77e87eecacd46", "index":"0" }

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: index
param.doc: The index of the support file in the array of support files. Note that this array is zero based

param.name: id
param.doc: An SHA-256 hash of the support file's filename. This must match the ID given in the URI.

param.name: comment
param.doc: The new comment to be associated with the support file
